name: Balloon Blast (itch) (alexandre-dc)
description:
Balloon Blast is an arcade game where you are tasked with the difficult job of... well... blasting balloons, of course. This is a fast-paced game, being a perfect fit for classic arcade games lovers and everyone that just wants to have a good time. Your objective is to blast as many balloons as you can before you run out of lives. Collect coins by playing and upgrade your stats to become the greatest balloon blaster this world has ever seen. 

Features 

        • 6 types of balloons, each one with unique interactions 

        • Upgrade your stats until you are unbeatable 

        • Infinite levels
